page.title: 15EMPLOYMENT
page.content:
From a survey of the Parents of the children attending Elham school these were their occupations:-
Electrician 3 Builder 4 Engineer 2 Builders Merchant 1 Teacher 3 Author 1 Personel Officer 1 Fence erector 1 Plumber 2 Scrap metal work 1 Housewives 22 Priest 1 Farmworkers 4 Freelance Illustrator 1 Musician 1 Shepherd 1 Organ Builder 1 Dog trimmer 1 Printer 1 Poultry farmer1 Nurse 4 Chartered accountant1 Train manager 1 Surveyor 2 Auditor 1 Dress designer1 Vet 1 Hair dresser 1 Chiropodist 1 Insurance agent 1 Dental technician 1 Dentist 1
